fulltext:
HOANG MINH PHUNG 
CAREER OVERVIEW 
- I am the Principal Network Engineer of Huawei Technologies (Thailand), Technical 
Director for projects in SEA countries 
- I was a Senior Expert of Aircom International (TEOCO) in APAC and MENA 
- Accumulated 14+ years in telecommunications section, successfully delivered 20+ 
big projects with leading global vendors and mobile operators in Vietnam, SEA, 
MENA & China 
- Main Expertise in Transmission Technologies (Radio, IP, Optical) for Mobile 
Networks (GSM, UMTS, LTE) 
- Master of Transmission Planning and Optimization tools 
- Experience in Data Analysis & VBA in Excel, Python & R. Recommendations & 
Solutions Proposal 
- Experience in major vendors' equipment & systems (Huawei, Ericsson, Nokia, 
Cisco) & telecom testing instruments 
- Full support (Bidding/ Presale, Planning, Delivery, Operation, Audit & Optimization, 
Acceptance). Training, Meeting, Team Leading & Partner Technology Management 
- Knowledge of Business Analytics, Insights and Decision Making for Customers, 
Operations, People & Finance 
- Knowledge of New Technologies (Big Data, IoT, Smart City Management, Huawei 
5G Solutions) 
- Fluent English, Logical Mindset, Impressive Presentation & Quick Reporting, 
Efficient Discussion & Productive Meeting Lead 
EXPERIENCE: 
01/03/2014 – Now: 
Huawei Technologies 
TECHNICAL DIRECTOR 
- Services Delivery for Projects in SEA Region (2015-Now), and Global Projects from 
Shenzhen, China (2014) 
- TL/TD of Network Planning & Design, Rollout & Modernization Delivery, Network 
Audit & Optimization projects. Technology Consulting for Regulation Bodies and 
Customers, Training and Coaching for Local Teams 
- Data Collection, Performance Evaluation, Root Cause Finding, Network Analysis, 
Quick Fix & long-term Solution Design, Lead Interface in Discussions with 
Customers & relevant Stakeholders, Solution Implementation, KPI Management   
- MPT, Telenor, Vodafone, Ooredoo, Viettel/ Mytel, Hutchison/ Vietnamobile, Airtel, 
IDEA, DTAC, AIS, TRUE, VIVO Brazil ..  
01/05/2009 - 01/08/2013 
Aircom International (TEOCO) 
SENIOR EXPERT 
- Key Network Consultant for Aircom International (TEOCO) in APAC & MENA about 
GSM/UMTS/LTE TX Network Audit, Planning, Optimization & Customer Experience 
Management 
- Solution Design, HLD/LLD/DD, Platform Delivery, Tool Training, Team 
Management and Presale Supports 
- Beeline (Vinpelcom), Espresso Group, MTN Group, Etisalat UAE, ROBI Axiata, 
VMS Mobifone 
01/07/2007 - 01/05/2009 
VNPT-NEC Telecommunication Systems 
MICROWAVE IMPLEMENTATION ENGINEER 
- Microwave TL in South Vietnam 
- NEC Pasolink Implementation Projects                                                        
01/06/2005 - 01/06/2007 
CDMA Mobile Phone Center (S-Telecom) 
OMC ENGINEER 
- Transmission Operation and Maintenance 
- Network Troubleshooting and Quality Improvement 
TRÌNH ĐỘ HỌC VẤN 
01/01/2006 - 01/03/2019 
Companies & Universities 
MIX QUALIFICATION/KHÁC 
TELECOMMUNICATIONS 
- Global Competence & Qualification Level 4, Service Family, Product Technology 
(Huawei Technologies)  
- Global Competence & Qualification Level 4, Service Family, Planning & 
Optimization (Huawei Technologies)  
- Internet of Things (King's College London) 
- Smart Cities Management, The École Polytechnique Fédérale de Lausanne (EPFL) 
- CCNA (Cisnet, Cisco)  
- Microwave Engineering & Optical Operation (NEC)  
- Network Planning and Design (Aircom International, TEOCO)  
DATA SCIENCE & BUSINESS ANALYTICS 
- Microsoft Data Science 
- Machine Learning (Stanford University) 
- Business Analytics, Wharton School (University of Pennsylvania) 
MANAGEMENT & SALES 
- Project Management, Saigon Hi-Tech Park (SHTP) 
- Mastering the Selling Process, BOOTH Business School (University of Chicago)  
01/09/2001 - 01/03/2006 
HCMC Posts & Telecommunications Institute Of Technology 
ELECTRONICS AND TELECOMMUNICATIONS 
ENGINEERING/CỬ NHÂN
